articles.title: Wendy Williams Struggled to Comprehend Talk Show Cancellation, Niece Says: 'It Took a Little Bit of Convincing' - PEOPLE
articles.description: 'The Wendy Williams Show' was taken off air in 2022, almost two years before Wendy Williams was diagnosed with aphasia and dementia
articles.content:
Wendy Williams didnt initially understand her talk show was canceled, according to her family.
